summary: In 1921, laconic adventurer Corto Maltese is in Turkey where several armed factions fight for control. He finds a map to a lost Persian treasure there. He'll need his friend Rasputin who's in Samarkand prison run by Corto's double.
cast: Richard Berry|Patrick Bouchitey|Catherine Jacob|Olivier Brun|Gerard Cherqui|Marie-Armelle Deguy|François Levantal|Philippe Nahon|Nadja Nguyen|Florence Thomassin|Julia Vaidis-Bogard|Jonathan Zaccaï
title: Corto Maltés: La casa dorada de Samarkanda
